column2: we were able to get to a table up on the second floor. Service was very friendly and efficient for how busy it was! Shared a simple salad to feel a little bit better about all of the calories we were about to inhale. This Chicago deep dish pizza was so decadant
column4: delicious. This was my first time trying Chicago pizza
column5: and for it to be Lou Malnati's... now nothing else can compare! Would highly recommend.
